mapper.select: SELECT m.memberNo, memberId, memberNickname, memberPwd, memberEmail, memberSocial, available FROM member m JOIN member_detail md ON m.memberNo = md.memberNo WHERE memberId = #{memberId}

SELECT m.memberNo, memberId, memberNickname, memberPwd, memberEmail, memberSocial, available FROM member m JOIN member_detail md ON m.memberNo = md.memberNo WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND memberPwd = #{memberPwd} AND available = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO member(memberNo, available) VALUES(member_seq.NEXTVAL, 1) INTO member(memberNo, memberId, memberNickname, memberPwd, memberEmail, memberSocial) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{memberId}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberSocial})
